Page Got Loaded
format:
<script>
(function() {
    (function(scope) {
        scope.send({payload: "preload"}); // this gets sent when the view is opened in the browser
    })(scope);
})();
</script>

name: Grafana
format:
<html>
<iframe id="myFrame" width="1500px" height="1000px" style = "overflow:hidden; margin:auto; border:0px solid green;"></iframe>

<script>
//NOTE, more then one chart on a page, rename in the second and following 
//templates the "myframe" variable so that every template has a unique name.
(function(scope) {
    // watch msg object from Node-RED
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        // new message received
        var x = document.getElementById('myFrame');
        x.setAttribute('src', msg.payload); 
        });
})(scope);
</script>
</html>
